issue.title: [C++] Add Parquet docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is currently zero Sphinx doc for Parquet. I'm adding a stub in ARROW-6630 but we should do more, especially as Arrow benefits from tight integration with Parquet.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6699?focusedCommentId=16937840) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Yes I agree having documentation for parquet-cpp would be a good thing
